headline: Kroger Turns To Greg Foran To Reset Execution And Digital Grocery Plan
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) has appointed Greg Foran, former Walmart U.S. chief, as its new CEO. Foran is being brought in to focus on operational improvements and digital transformation. The leadership change follows the failed merger attempt with Albertsons. Kroger, one of the largest supermarket operators in the U.S., is making this leadership shift at a time when traditional grocers are contending with pressure from big box retailers, club stores, and online grocery offerings. Foranâ€™s background...

headline: How Walmart's Q4 earnings could 'surprise'
summary: Walmart (WMT) reports fourth quarter earnings results before markets open on Thursday, Feb. 19. Jefferies senior vice president of equity research Corey Tarlowe joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss his outlook for the retailer's upcoming results, his expectations for the new CEO, and more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: How Walmart's Q4 earnings could 'surprise'
content.description:
Walmart (WMT) reports fourth quarter earnings results before markets open on Thursday, Feb. 19.

Jefferies senior vice president of equity research Corey Tarlowe joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss his outlook for the retailer's upcoming results, his expectations for the new CEO, and more.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: MCoBeauty Expands Global Footprint with Canadian Retail Launch at Walmart
summary: Starting today, MCoBeauty, the globally-celebrated beauty brand redefining affordable luxury, is officially launching in Canada with first availability at Walmart Canada. With its beloved beauty products now available at more than 247 Walmart Canada stores across the country and online at Walmart.ca, the move represents a strategic extension of the brand's North American expansion and a key step in scaling its global retail presence.
